verses.verse: Listen, <S%H8085><s%> islands, <S%H339><s%> to me; <S%H7181><s%> and listen, you peoples, <S%H3816><s%> from far: <S%H7350><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has called <S%H7121><s%> me from the womb; <S%H990><s%> from the bowels <S%H4578><s%> of my mother <S%H517><s%> has he made mention <S%H2142><s%> of my name: <S%H8034><s%>

and he has made <S%H7760><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%> like a sharp <S%H2299><s%> sword; <S%H2719><s%> in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of his hand, <S%H3027><s%> he has hidden <S%H2244><s%> me: <S%H7760><s%> and he has made me a polished <S%H1305><s%> shaft; <S%H2671><s%> in his quiver <S%H827><s%> has he kept me close: <S%H5641><s%>
and he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H5650><s%> "You are my servant; Israel, <S%H3478><s%> in whom I will be glorified. <S%H6286><s%>"

But I said, <S%H559><s%> "I have labored <S%H3021><s%> in vain, <S%H7385><s%> I have spent <S%H3615><s%> my strength <S%H3581><s%> for nothing <S%H8414><s%> and vanity; <S%H1892><s%> yet surely <S%H403><s%> the justice <S%H4941><s%> due to me is with Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and my reward <S%H6468><s%> with my God. <S%H430><s%>"

Now says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who formed <S%H3335><s%> me from the womb <S%H990><s%> to be his servant, <S%H5650><s%> to bring <S%H7725><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to him, <S%H3478><s%> and that Israel be gathered <S%H622><s%> to him <S%H3513><s%> (for I am honorable in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and my God <S%H430><s%> has become my strength <S%H5797><s%>);

yes, <S%H559><s%> he says, "It is too light a thing <S%H7043><s%> that you should be my servant <S%H5650><s%> to raise up <S%H6965><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and to restore <S%H7725><s%> the preserved <S%H5341><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> I will also give <S%H5414><s%> you for a light <S%H216><s%> to the nations, <S%H1471><s%> that you may be my salvation <S%H3444><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the Redeemer <S%H1350><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and his Holy One, <S%H6918><s%> to him whom man <S%H5315><s%> despises, <S%H960><s%> to him whom the nation <S%H1471><s%> abhors, <S%H8581><s%> to a servant <S%H5650><s%> of rulers: <S%H4910><s%> "Kings <S%H4428><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> and arise; <S%H6965><s%> princes, <S%H8269><s%> and they shall worship; <S%H7812><s%> because of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who is faithful, <S%H539><s%> even the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who has chosen you. <S%H977><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "In an acceptable <S%H7522><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> have I answered <S%H6030><s%> you, <S%H3117><s%> and in a day of salvation <S%H3444><s%> have I helped <S%H5826><s%> you; <S%H5341><s%> and I will preserve you, <S%H5414><s%> and give you for a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> to raise <S%H6965><s%> up the land, <S%H776><s%> to make them inherit <S%H5157><s%> the desolate <S%H8074><s%> heritage: <S%H5159><s%>

saying <S%H559><s%> to those who are bound, <S%H631><s%> <S%H3318><s%> 'Come out!'; to those who are in darkness, <S%H2822><s%> <S%H1540><s%> 'Show yourselves! <S%H7462><s%>' "They shall feed in the ways, <S%H1870><s%> and on all bare heights <S%H8205><s%> shall be their pasture. <S%H4830><s%>

They shall not hunger <S%H7456><s%> nor thirst; <S%H6770><s%> neither shall the heat <S%H8273><s%> nor sun <S%H8121><s%> strike <S%H5221><s%> them: <S%H7355><s%> for he who has mercy on them will lead <S%H5090><s%> them, <S%H4002><s%> even by springs of water <S%H4325><s%> he will guide them. <S%H5095><s%>
I will make <S%H7760><s%> all my mountains <S%H2022><s%> a way, <S%H1870><s%> and my highways <S%H4546><s%> shall be exalted. <S%H7311><s%>

Behold, <S%H935><s%> these shall come from far; <S%H7350><s%> and behold, <S%H6828><s%> these from the north and from the west; <S%H3220><s%> and these from the land <S%H776><s%> of Sinim. <S%H5515><s%>"

Sing, <S%H7442><s%> heavens; <S%H8064><s%> and be joyful, <S%H1523><s%> earth; <S%H776><s%> and break forth <S%H6476><s%> into singing, <S%H7440><s%> mountains: <S%H2022><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has comforted <S%H5162><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> and will have compassion <S%H7355><s%> on his afflicted. <S%H6041><s%>
But Zion <S%H6726><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> and the Lord has forgotten me. <S%H7911><s%>"

"Can a woman <S%H802><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> her nursing child, <S%H5764><s%> that she should not have compassion <S%H7355><s%> on the son <S%H1121><s%> of her womb? <S%H990><s%> Yes, <S%H7911><s%> these may forget, yet I will not forget you! <S%H7911><s%>
Behold, <S%H2710><s%> I have engraved you on the palms of my hands; <S%H3709><s%> your walls <S%H2346><s%> are continually before me. <S%H8548><s%>
Your children <S%H1121><s%> make haste; <S%H4116><s%> your destroyers <S%H2040><s%> and those who made you waste <S%H2717><s%> shall go forth from you. <S%H3318><s%>

Lift up <S%H5375><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> all around, <S%H5439><s%> and see: <S%H7200><s%> all these gather themselves together, <S%H6908><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> to you. <S%H2416><s%> As I live," says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "you shall surely clothe <S%H3847><s%> yourself with them all as with an ornament, <S%H5716><s%> and dress <S%H7194><s%> yourself with them, <S%H3618><s%> like a bride.

"For, <S%H2723><s%> as for your waste and your desolate places, <S%H8074><s%> and your land <S%H776><s%> that has been destroyed, <S%H2035><s%> surely now you shall be too small <S%H3334><s%> for the inhabitants, <S%H3427><s%> and those who swallowed you up <S%H1104><s%> shall be far away. <S%H7368><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of your bereavement <S%H7923><s%> shall yet say <S%H559><s%> in your ears, <S%H241><s%> The place <S%H4725><s%> is too small <S%H6862><s%> for me; <S%H5066><s%> give place <S%H4725><s%> to me that I may dwell. <S%H3427><s%>

Then you will say <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> <S%H3205><s%> 'Who has conceived these for me, <S%H7921><s%> since I have been bereaved of my children, and am solitary, <S%H1565><s%> an exile, <S%H1540><s%> and wandering back and forth? <S%H5493><s%> Who has brought up <S%H1431><s%> these? <S%H7604><s%> Behold, I was left alone; <S%H375><s%> these, where were they?'"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> "Behold, <S%H5375><s%> I will lift up my hand <S%H3027><s%> to the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and set up <S%H7311><s%> my banner <S%H5251><s%> to the peoples; <S%H5971><s%> and they shall bring <S%H935><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> in their bosom, <S%H2684><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be carried <S%H5375><s%> on their shoulders. <S%H3802><s%>

Kings <S%H4428><s%> shall be your nursing fathers, <S%H539><s%> and their queens <S%H8282><s%> your nursing mothers: <S%H3243><s%> they shall bow down <S%H7812><s%> to you with their faces <S%H639><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> and lick <S%H3897><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of your feet; <S%H7272><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and those who wait <S%H6960><s%> for me shall not be disappointed. <S%H954><s%>"
Shall the prey <S%H4455><s%> be taken <S%H3947><s%> from the mighty, <S%H1368><s%> or the lawful <S%H6662><s%> captives <S%H7628><s%> be delivered? <S%H4422><s%>

But thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Even the captives <S%H7628><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> shall be taken away, <S%H3947><s%> and the prey <S%H4455><s%> of the terrible <S%H6184><s%> shall be delivered; <S%H4422><s%> for I will contend <S%H7378><s%> with him who contends <S%H7378><s%> with you, <S%H3467><s%> and I will save your children. <S%H1121><s%>

I will feed <S%H398><s%> those who oppress <S%H3238><s%> you with their own flesh; <S%H1320><s%> and they shall be drunken <S%H7937><s%> with their own blood, <S%H1818><s%> as with sweet wine: <S%H6071><s%> and all flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, am your Savior, <S%H3467><s%> and your Redeemer, <S%H1350><s%> the Mighty One <S%H46><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>"
